pinfo.title: Contigo Insulated Water Bottle
pinfo.description: A moderately used insulated bottle from Contigo. Great for general useage, and holding hot or cold liquids.

pinfo.title: Redragon Gaming Mouse
pinfo.description: A decent gaming mouse. Reliable. Slightly used. RGB. Suitable for casual and semi-competitive useage.

pinfo.title: Surface Pro 6
pinfo.description: Practically new. Barely used. Comes with pen and keyboard.

pinfo.title: Generic Bluetooth Gamepad
pinfo.description: Compatible with Android natively. Charges with microusb

pinfo.title: Creative Outlier Air Bluetooth TWS Earbuds
pinfo.description: Great pair of truly wireless earbuds. Works with iOS and Android. Charging cable included.
